_comment_commission_per_lot: Trading commission per standard lot in USD
_comment_slippage_pips: Simulated slippage in pips per trade
_comment_train_window_days: Training window size for walk-forward optimization
_comment_test_window_days: Test window size for walk-forward optimization
_comment_walk_forward_parallel: Enable parallel fold training (may cause GPU contention)
_comment_n_simulations: Number of Monte Carlo simulations for risk analysis
_comment_confidence_level: Statistical confidence level for Monte Carlo CI (0.95 = 95%)
